description: Nutrient analysis is performed for each of the 9 monthly and 8 seasonal LifeWatch stations. Water is sampled with Niskin bottles at 3 meters depth and filtered directly. The filtered water is stored in the freezer to be analyzed later on by the Royal Netherlands Institute for Sea Research (NIOZ).
keywords: RV Simon Stevin, sampling, station, oceanography, chemistry, Oceanographic geographical features
name: Physical properties seawater (nitrite + nitrate + ammonium, Belgian part of North Sea, 2014-2017)
